plot: When the ghost Melinda is trying to help suddenly turns up alive, she finds herself in the middle of a dangerous revenge plot and battling enemies she was unaware she had.

As Melinda's visions intensify, making her unable to distinguish reality, Jim, Ned and Delia discuss what course of actions to take to best help her. Meanwhile, as Carl talks Melinda towards ending Aiden's ability to see ghosts and beyond (for his own protection), Melinda confronts what seems to be the angry, impossibly disembodied spirit of a living man, who tells her "the light" isn't what she thinks it's cracked up to be, all of which makes her increasingly unsure of herself.—statmanjeff
